verses.verse: The <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was on me, and <S%H3318>carried<s%> me out in the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5117>set<s%> me down in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H1237>valley<s%> <S%H1958>which<s%> was <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H6106>bones,<s%>

And caused me to <S%H5674>pass<s%> by them <S%H5439>round<s%> about: and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H1237>valley;<s%> and, <S%H2009>see,<s%> they were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3002>dry.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> can <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H2421>live?<s%> And I <S%H559>answered,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> you <S%H3045>know.<s%>

Again he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H5012>Prophesy<s%> on <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6106>bones,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, O you <S%H3002>dry<s%> <S%H6106>bones,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6106>bones;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will cause <S%H7307>breath<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> into you, and you shall <S%H2421>live:<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> <S%H1517>sinews<s%> on you, and will <S%H5927>bring<s%> up <S%H1320>flesh<s%> on you, and <S%H7159>cover<s%> you with <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H7307>breath<s%> in you, and you shall <S%H2421>live;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

So I <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> as I was <S%H6680>commanded:<s%> and as I <S%H5012>prophesied,<s%> there was a <S%H6963>noise,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> a <S%H7494>shaking,<s%> and the <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H7126>came<s%> together, <S%H6106>bone<s%> to his <S%H6106>bone.<s%>

And when I <S%H7200>beheld,<s%> <S%H2009>see,<s%> the <S%H1517>sinews<s%> and the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up on them, and the <S%H5785>skin<s%> <S%H7159>covered<s%> them <S%H4605>above:<s%> but there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7307>breath<s%> in them.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he to me, <S%H5012>Prophesy<s%> to the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H935>Come<s%> from the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>winds,<s%> O <S%H7307>breath,<s%> and <S%H5301>breathe<s%> on <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2026>slain,<s%> that they may <S%H2421>live.<s%>

So I <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> as he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me, and the <S%H7307>breath<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into them, and they <S%H2421>lived,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> up on their <S%H7272>feet,<s%> an <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2428>army.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6106>bones<s%> are the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they <S%H559>say,<s%> Our <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H3001>dried,<s%> and our <S%H8615>hope<s%> is <S%H6>lost:<s%> we are <S%H1504>cut<s%> off for our parts.

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> O my <S%H5971>people,<s%> I will <S%H6605>open<s%> your <S%H6913>graves,<s%> and cause you to <S%H5927>come<s%> up out of your <S%H6913>graves,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> you <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when I have <S%H6605>opened<s%> your <S%H6913>graves,<s%> O my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H5927>brought<s%> you up out of your <S%H6913>graves,<s%>

And shall <S%H5414>put<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in you, and you shall <S%H2421>live,<s%> and I shall <S%H3241>place<s%> you in your own <S%H127>land:<s%> then shall you <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it, and <S%H6213>performed<s%> it, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>LORD.<s%>
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> again to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Moreover, you <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> you <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6086>stick,<s%> and <S%H3789>write<s%> on it, For <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H2270>companions:<s%> then <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H6086>stick,<s%> and <S%H3789>write<s%> on it, For <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> the <S%H6086>stick<s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>and for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H2270>companions:<s%>
And <S%H7126>join<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> to <S%H259>another<s%> into <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6086>stick;<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of your <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>speak<s%> to you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Will you not <S%H5046>show<s%> us <S%H4100>what<s%> you mean by <S%H428>these?<s%>

<S%H1696>Say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H6086>stick<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H2270>fellows,<s%> and will <S%H5414>put<s%> them with him, <S%H853>even<s%> with the <S%H6086>stick<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6086>stick,<s%> and they shall be <S%H259>one<s%> in my <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
And the <S%H6086>sticks<s%> where <S%H834>on<s%> <S%H5921><s%> you <S%H3789>write<s%> shall be in your <S%H3027>hand<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

And <S%H1696>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they be <S%H1980>gone,<s%> and will <S%H6908>gather<s%> them on <S%H5437>every<s%> <S%H5439>side,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> their own <S%H127>land:<s%>

And I will <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> shall be <S%H4428>king<s%> to them <S%H3605>all:<s%> and they shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall they be <S%H2673>divided<s%> into <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> at all.

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall they <S%H2930>defile<s%> themselves any <S%H5750>more<s%> with their <S%H1544>idols,<s%> nor with their <S%H8251>detestable<s%> things, nor with <S%H3605>any<s%> of their <S%H6588>transgressions:<s%> but I will <S%H3467>save<s%> them out of <S%H3605>all<s%> their dwelling <S%H4186>places,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> they have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and will <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> them: so shall they be my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will be their <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall be <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them; and they <S%H3605>all<s%> shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd:<s%> they shall also <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and <S%H8104>observe<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them.

And they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> that I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H3427>dwelled;<s%> and they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein, even they, and their <S%H1121>children,<s%> and their <S%H1121>children's<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> for <S%H5769>ever:<s%> and my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> shall be their <S%H5387>prince<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

Moreover I will <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> with them; it shall be an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them: and I will <S%H5414>place<s%> them, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> them, and will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of them for ever <S%H5769>more.<s%>
My <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> also shall be with them: yes, I will be their <S%H430>God,<s%> and they shall be my <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> do <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> shall be in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of them for ever <S%H5769>more.<s%>
